Attribute.name: NameschemeAttributes
Attribute.purpose: Information and methods to manage nameschemes

Field.name: externalArrayOffsets
Field.label: Offsets into external indexing array data for each array

Field.name: externalArrayData
Field.label: Data for external indexing arrays (flattened from all arrays into one vector)

Field.name: allExplicitNames
Field.label: List of ALL explicit names for the case where the namescheme is just an explicit list of names

Field.name: explicitIds
Field.label: Ids of those entries with explicit names

Field.name: explicitNames
Field.label: Names of those entries with explicit names
